title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.
There is a difference of 5.42 between the maximum Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and minimum Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage score for 15 number of Automobile Manufacturerss.
The Percentage score is appeared to be the highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.
There is a difference of 5.42 between the maximum Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and minimum Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage score for 15 number of Automobile Manufacturerss.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score and Toyota has the lowest Percentage score.
Automobile Manufacturers Porsche has the second highest value for Percentage score.
The difference of Percentage score between the highest and lowest Automobile Manufacturers is 5.42.
The Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score, followed by Porsche, and Audi. Down to the Automobile Manufacturers Toyota which is the lowest.
The lowest value 88.85 at Toyota is almost 1.03 times smaller than the average value 91.71.
